body: This reference shows that for an overflow std::cosh overflows to inf in any case, no matter the sign of the argument. If this is not changed it'll fail and why not stick to the standard.
body_html: This reference shows that for an overflow std::cosh overflows to inf in any case, no matter the sign of the argument. If this is not changed it'll fail and why not stick to the standard.
